body:
Features and Enhancements

Network Builder and Optimizer

  • [NBO] Add associated provider links for hospitals
    • When viewing a facility, the Employed and Admitting provider counts are displayed and link to Detail Results list.
  • [NBO] Update design of Switch Provider Views on results page
    • Toggle to view by Locations or Groups

Confirmed Practicing

This feature requires additional provider data.
  • Display bubble graph in Competitive Dashboard for both All Providers and Confirmed Providers on the Market Penetration page
  • Add Confirmed Providers bar to each network in Competitive Dashboard Top Networks graphs
    • Hover tacked bar on Dashboard Results and Project Summary Details pages to view network details.

Competitive Dashboard

  • Make percentage values consistent throughout the feature
    • All percentages are one decimal point.
